about_the_game:
Joining the Ninza Club gives you instant access to all in-game items, cosmetics, and options... FOREVER.


Only club members can reach the top of the leaderboard and aim for the Master rank. With your membership card, you unlock access to all ranks beyond the Bronze 5-stars limit. Your progress now knows no bounds!



You can now use all unlocked profile customization items and all future ones. The number of stickers you can place on your profile increases from the basic 3 to 10. Pimp your style without limits!



Enjoy unrestricted access to the complete list of all available balloons! Your taunts will be fancier than ever, hehe.



Unveil all hidden memories of each character! As a club member, no secret can resist you.



Once you're in the club, you stay in... FOREVER. This means all future items added in upcoming seasons will always be accessible to you.

IMPORTANT NOTE

Club membership does not automatically unlock items but grants the ability to use/select them. You still need to unlock them via the in-game shop using your Mo0n Favor, the game currency. There's no way to gain Mo0n Favor other than by playing, so additional purchases for cosmetics are impossible. We respect our club members' wallets!

Access to future additional characters is not included in the Ninza Club offer.

name: Ninza - Ninza Club Lifetime Membership

package_groups.title: Buy Ninza - Ninza Club Lifetime Membership

short_description: Unlock ALL the cool stuff without restrictions: online ranks, levels, profile customization items, options, balloons, and memories. The Ninza Club Lifetime Membership lasts FOREVER, granting access to new items in future updates!
